hero_description: Explore the flavors of your city with us. Share your favorite dishes and discover new ones rated by other food lovers like you.

subject: Subject
motto_features: Dive into the Flavors of Uzbekistan with Dastarkhan
motto_description: Whether you're a newcomer or a local resident, Dastarkhan is your go-to guide for discovering hidden culinary treasures.
feature_1_description: Find the best local restaurants and dishes in Uzbekistan easily. Get detailed reviews, ratings, and photos from real customers.
feature_2_description: Like, save, and comment on posts, and follow other users. Join a community of passionate foodies who share your love of food.
feature_3_description: Provide valuable feedback to help them improve their offerings, refine their menu, adjust their prices, and enhance their customer service.
